actionConfiguration.body:
WITH
	detail AS
	(
		SELECT
			target_spend_input * (distribution_pct / 100) as expected_target_spend_distribution,
			target_spend_distribution
		FROM
			REFERENCE_DEV.PICNMIX_GOALS.PICNMIX_GOALS_DETAIL
		WHERE
			fk_goal_id = {{ SelectGoal.selectedOptionValue }}	
	),
	
	target_spend AS
	(
		SELECT
			'target_spend' AS label,
			SUM(target_spend_distribution) AS value
		FROM
			detail	
	),
	
	remaining_spend AS
	(
		SELECT
			'remaining_spend' AS label,
			SUM(expected_target_spend_distribution) - SUM(target_spend_distribution) as value
		FROM
			detail	
	)
	
SELECT *
FROM
	target_spend
UNION ALL
SELECT *
FROM
	remaining_spend
